Header: Errant gas traders will be nabbed
Content: The government has reduced prices of 5 kilogram and 2.3 kilogram gas cylinders. Accordingly, price of 5 kilogram gas cylinder will be reduced by 55 rupees and 2.3 kilogram cylinder by 25 rupees. The price reduction was made in line with the reduction of price of 12.5 kilogram gas cylinder, recently. The Ministry of Commerce and Industry announces that it is reported that some unscrupulous traders sell gas cylinders at higher prices than the reduced. Raids are being conducted to nab such errant traders.
